stems.BSC: (to be) an organelle within a biological cell
stems.CTE: (to be) the physical body of an organelle within a biological cell
stems.CSV: (to be) the physical operation of an organelle within a biological cell
stems.OBJ: (to be) function/purpose of an organelle within a biological cell

stems: (to be) the plasma membrane / cell membrane of a biological cell
(to be) the cytoplasm (cytosol) within a biological cell

refers: nuclear envelope / nuclear pore / endoplasmic reticulum
Golgi apparatus / Golgi vesicle / secretory vesicle
